授業目的: The objective of this class is to have students enjoy studying English while improving their ability to express themselves in English.
到達目標:
1. Practice everyday conversation
2. Read and understand the book
3. Create a unique project related to the book
授業方法: This semester's class will be taught online.  If you took the spring class, please check Google Classroom.  If you are new to this class, you will receive an invitation in your email about the class code.

第1回: Introduction to class.  Class objectives and expectations.  Getting to know the class.
